posts.description:
💫✨🌼
heehee seems that Iately love to practice poses that I learned here on IG and haven’t practiced for some time 😍.
.
In a metaphorical way one can say my mind is wandering through the past. I truly think it’s ok to spend some time to worship the past. After all it made me the person I am… including all the things I learned, all the things I chose, all my edges, and all the little gems I could collect over time 🙌🏼.
.
I like the past. It’s the only thing that is set in stone. Irrevocable. Isn’t that somehow soothing? Like the purring of a cat .. or the nickering of a horse 😍.
.
Hope you all have a great Thursday. Enjoy to the fullest. No matter where you spend it ❤️.
.
#yoga #yogapose #horsepose #vatayanasana #deepthoughts

💫✨🌼
When I saw Holly with this pose I got reminded that I haven't done this pose for quite some time and the memory of my very first one popped up my mind. It's not on my page anymore but I try to find it. I remember that I didn't know exactly what to do in that pose. It was hilarious 🤣
.
Anyway. I thought I revisit it to serve a tag to #stopdropandyoga by the sweetest @omniyogagirl 💟 thank you so much for thinking of me, Laura 🙏🏼
.
Passing the tag to #sdy and #strikeapose to @mala_yogamat @cece.carson and @liifong whenever you feel the urge to revisit an old friend ❤️
.
Jumping in for day 7 of #InvertYourInnerYogi with the amazing ladies @yogaandchaigirl @mansuz @seonia and @bohemian_heart ☀️
.
#yoga #yogapose #supersoldier #soldierpose

📿🤓📖☘️
An often requested pose is #GrassHopperPose aka #DragonFlyPose (and its Baby variation). It took me a while to get it. I only mention hip openers 🙈. I am not necessarily an exhibit A for open hips so this pose eluded me a long time. Until I learned that this is also a deep #twist. All of a sudden this pose was within reach. 👉🏼Please warm up with your regular practice, add some extra time in hip openers (pigeon, Janu Sirsasana, baby cradle) and twists.
.
🎬SLIDE 1 Full Pose
.
1️⃣ start seated (takes out the balancing element)! I’m a lazy yogi 😂. Legs in Figure 4. Stay here for some breaths
2️⃣ Spine long & tall. Inhale, twist to the left. Bring your arm pit to your foot. Foot is pressing onto the arm, arm is pressing back ↔️
3️⃣ Place your hands shoulder width distance at your side. Elbows might splay. SQUEEZE them in (this will lock the foot in place 🔐
4️⃣ wriggle your left foot closer to your bum. PRESS the pinky edge of the foot into the mat. LEAN a bit forward, STAND up, LIFT your bum. Take a solid stand on the back of your right arm 👊🏼
5️⃣ LEAN forward into Chaturanga. Elbows keep squeezing in. Gaze forward. Stay here OR 
6️⃣ EXTEND the left leg straight. No need to wriggle around. Just straighten it from the knee cap
.
🎬SLIDE 2 If your body is not ready yet work on creating the memory in your body with the baby variation
.
1️⃣ start in a cross-legged forward fold (in the pic it’s the left behind the right leg)
2️⃣ SHIFT your weight onto the right foot
3️⃣ BEND both legs, grab the INNER side of your left foot
4️⃣ straighten the left leg, simultaneously bend the right leg even more
5️⃣ lower the entire body aka SIT DOWN
6️⃣ now bring your right arm in front of your shin; push into your hand, the hand pulls back. Inhale into cow, LEAN forward until your left arm is in Chaturanga
‼️Prop up your heels if your calves are not flexible enough yet to allow them to go all the way down. Roll up your mat, use a block/book to stand on
.
🖍SIDE NOTES
🚫Use of body lotion or oil is not recommended 😉
❗️the foot on the arm is always pushing down
.
Hope this helps. Any questions?
.
#yoga #asana #yogatutorial #armbalance #DreasBeginnerTips #DreaIsTeaching

💫✨🌼
Got tagged by the outstanding @helen_garner_yoga @yogawesermarsch and @auri_yoga to #stopdropandyoga and after all those crows I had the urge to streeeetch out long and tall 😜. Thank you so, so much for thinking of me, precious souls 💖. Sorry, you had to wait a bit.
.
Passing the tag to #sdy and #strikeapose to the superwomen @throwing.shapes @supermomtraci and @bowlingandyoga whenever you are up for some play ❤️.
.
#yoga #armbalance #inversion #forearmstand #pinchamayurasana

🕺🏻💃🏻🐦
Using a shot from February when it was warm and sunny as last post for my amazing friends Alli, Becca and Jade. Ladies, thank you for making me do it 😜. I have to admit it... I totally copied my friend and #twinbyheart @buddhamom76 here. She inspired me to dig deep to find my editing tools to shapeshift into a crow 🎨🎭. Side note: the hair is not edited. The breeze was strong but warm 😝.
.
💞I can only repeat myself. I had so much fun with all of you, inspiring souls. A huge shout to my IGBestie and friend Clare @clarerdubai - for the first time ever she did all days of a challenge together with us 😂. I hope for more because she was my muse on one or the other day. I hope we can join a challenge soon again ❤️(and I'm totally egoistical here ☺️).
.
Here my #BonusDay of #CrowItBabyOneMoreTime #BeTheCrow with the glorious crow hosts @alli_roush @bowlingandyoga @jadebellyyoga and rockin' sponsors @climawear @infinitystrap @yogapaws 💎
.
#yoga #yogapose #armbalance #CrowPose #Bakasana #latergram

🕺🏻💃🏻🐦
😳Already the last and final day (although there is a bonus day I heard) of this quick 'n short and SUPER fun challenge hosted by my dear friends Alli, Becca and Jade. Ladies, you ROCK 🎸🎼🎤😎. Seriously. Many thanks for all the helpful tips and tricks. Thanks for igniting the creative spark in all of us 💫. Many, many thanks to all of my fellow crowers. The love and support you spread was and still is unparalleled. Gosh what fun it was to play with you ❤️.
.
For today I went with this shape of my hands. Wrist to Wrist. No idea what it’s called officially 😂. But I see them as wings 😍. Maybe you know the name? I'm eager to learn 🤓.
.
Can’t wait to be back from teaching my Easter workshop to catch up on all your amazing baks 😎.
.
Happy Easter Sunday to everyone. CawCawwwwww 🐦🦅🦉🐣.
.
Day.7 of #CrowItBabyOneMoreTime is #TrickArmCrow with the inestimable crow hosts @alli_roush @bowlingandyoga @jadebellyyoga and rockin' sponsors @climawear @infinitystrap @yogapaws 💎
.
#yoga #yogapose #armbalance #CrowPose #Bakasana

🕺🏻💃🏻🐦
Combining two days of this fun challenge in one sweep. Well, basically combining three days because I’m using props here 😜. But I was falling behind and I wanna keep pace with all of you☺️.
.
Hope your Easter weekend is fabulous and awesome 🐣💛🐣
.
Day.5 and Day.6 of #CrowItBabyOneMoreTime is #FingerTipCrow and #BabyCrow #BabyBakasana with the loveliest crow hosts @alli_roush @bowlingandyoga @jadebellyyoga and rockin' sponsors @climawear @infinitystrap @yogapaws 💎
.
#yoga #yogapose #armbalance #CrowPose #Bakasana #ClareMadeMeDoIt

🕺🏻💃🏻🐦
What is a yoga prop? Here is what I found in the internet "A yoga prop is a supportive object used in performing an asana. [...] A yoga prop also helps one remain in a pose for a longer length of time. [...] Modern yoga props help the yogi achieve optimum benefits from a pose regardless of age, flexibility level or experience."
.
Here ya go 😜 Perching my crow high up on my handstand canes to achieve optimum benefits from it. No matter how old I am I truly enjoy playing with props and poses. It’s incredible fascinating how props change the experience of a long-known old friend like crow pose. It's almost like a we'd meet for the very first time 😍.
.
Happy good Friday to everyone. It’s a public holiday here in Germany. Where else in this world? 🤗
.
Day.4 of #CrowItBabyOneMoreTime is #PropBalanceCrow with the super supportive crow hosts @alli_roush @bowlingandyoga @jadebellyyoga amd rockin' sponsors @climawear @infinitystrap @yogapaws 💎
.
#yoga #yogapose #armbalance #handstandcanes #CrowPose #Bakasana

💫✨🌼
A quick #stopdropandyoga before heading to teach a private yoga class. Thank you sooo much for thinking of my, lovely ladies @greenideas80 @giddyprana and @auri_yoga 🖤 Passing the tag to #sdy and #strikeapose to @leighemily @life_yoga_rob and @bonnieenglund whenever you feel like it 🌺
.
Pose inspired by #EagleLegsForDays with the gorgeous @jbreton22 and @kellyogist 🙏🏼 👖 loving my new leggings by @kismetyogastyle 💗 check 'em out!
.
#yoga #yogapose #DownDog #EagleLegs

🕺🏻💃🏻🐦
Oh, what a day it was yesterday. Spent 5 hours in the car for a 30 min appointment (totally with it) and had only an hour before I had to teach. If you saw my IG story you know how I spent it 😍. I played around in that gorgeous light-flooded space. I totally got lost in time and space. I wanted to take so many pics .. and I did. Many tries for the ladies 😂.
.
Wednesday’s best of … #SideCrow with #EagleLegs and Rest Two Knees on One Arm … mission accomplished 😊. And off I am to the gallery. I guess I missed a lot of awesomeness yesterday 😎.
.
Happy … FriYAY. Yes, I mean it. Last day of the week in the office before Easter 😝. Any plans for the long weekend? I’m super excited about the workshop on Sunday but the other days? I am soooo going to chill. Got a new sun lounger and wanna try it ⛱.
.
Have you all a great Thursday ☀️❤️
.
Day.3 of #CrowItBabyOneMoreTime is #ExtendedArmCrow with the highly creative crow hosts @alli_roush @bowlingandyoga @jadebellyyoga amd rockin' sponsors @climawear @infinitystrap @yogapaws 💎
.
#yoga #yogapose #armbalance #CrowPose #Bakasana
